summary: During the production of his latest movie, a director feels the need to add a new scene, emphasising on the protagonist's aesthetic nudity. Endless negotiations begin between lunch and dinner; however, will they ever reach a conclusion?
cast: Bogdan Dumitrache|Diana Avramut|Mihaela Sirbu|Alexandru Papadopol|Alex Jitea|Gabi Cretan|Lucian Iftime|Claudiu Dumitru|Lorena-Andrada Zabrautanu|Catalin Fartaes
title: CÃ¢nd se lasa seara peste Bucuresti sau Metabolism
